full_summary:
# Government Contract Opportunity

## Contract Title and Reference

* **Contract Title**: W0100-234481 Vertical Milling Machines
* **Contract Reference Number**: WS4408967202-Doc4410891421

## Announcement Details

* **Publication Date**: January 24, 2024
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4408967202
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 15, 2024
* **Tender Status**: Expired

## Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **End User Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

## Contract Award Criteria

* **Contract Award Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Contract Award Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Goods/Services Requirements

* **UNSPSC Code**: 23242500 (Metal milling machines)
* **Description**: Two vertical milling machines are required by the Department of National Defence.

## Trade Agreements

* **Trade Agreements Applicable**: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Mirfatahi, Kaveh
* **Contact Email**: kaveh.mirfatahi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Sourcing Document

* **Sourcing URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18609467?extsite=MTg2MDk0NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Key details such as announcement dates, contract information, contract award criteria, and requirements are highlighted. While the contact information is present, the phone number and fax number were omitted since they were provided as "None" by the contractor. The sourcing document URL is now highlighted in the rephrased entry for easy reference.
